article.title: Lockheed Awarded Space Based Infrared Systems Funding
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Space Systems Company, Sunnyvale, Calif., is being awarded a $105,868,182 cost-plus incentive-fee and fixed-price incentive-firm contract for contractor logistics support, legacy sustainment and combined task force support for the Space Based Infrared Systems. The contracting activity is the Space and Missile Systems Center, Los Angeles Air Force Base, Calif.
